turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: To order two medium pizzas, meat lovers specials.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, meatlover on both of them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. One should have extra cheese and anchovies, though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! let me add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I got 2 medium Pizzas, one regular Meatlover, and a second one with extra cheese and anchovies as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. They also both need thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I've added thick crust to both of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful, let me repeat it back to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium Pizzas with thick crust, one regular Meatlover, and a second one with extra cheese and anchovies as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great!, one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total for these two pizzas will be $28.44, is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful, one moment while I process the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your pizzas are in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks Goodbye!
